abstract: The third week of the trial of Rajat K. Gupta, who has been charged with leaking corporate secrets about Goldman Sachs, began with the testimony of the bank’s chief executive.
snippet: The third week of the trial of Rajat K. Gupta, who has been charged with leaking corporate secrets about Goldman Sachs, began with the testimony of the bank’s chief executive.
lead_paragraph: For someone who has not practiced law in 30 years, Lloyd C. Blankfein has been spending quite of bit of time in the courtroom.

headline.main: Blankfein Takes the Stand in an Insider Trading Case
